author: AAA3A
name: Reminders
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: Don't forget anything anymore! Reminders in DMs, channels or FIFO commands... With 'Me Too', snooze and buttons.
description: Don't forget anything anymore! Reminders in DMs, channels or FIFO commands... With 'Me Too', snooze and buttons. You can migrate reminders from RemindMe by PhasecoreX.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does store users reminders, who are deleted when triggered.
